website_summaries.verdict: Ballistic's LifeStyle Smooth Series is an affordable, stylish, and durable case with just a few quirks.
pros: Ballistic's LifeStyle Smooth Series is trim, colorful, strong, and affordable
It comes with four sizes of corner bumpers
cons: Buttons feel stiff on the LifeStyle case, and the case material feels unappealingly grainy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: This case is perfect. I've always been told to get an Otterbox but they're so bulky. I keep my phone in my back pocket most of the time, or in a clutch if i don't have pockets and those cases are just too much. This one is perfect! It was tested by a 1 year old recently and passed with flying colors. She picked it up and started shaking it around so of course it slipped. It did just like it always does and landed screen down but the case did a great job of taking the impact. You couldn't even tell anything happened. I would recommend it to everyone. Can't wait to get all the colors.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Great basic case with plently of protection!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this case, I got it as a back-up for the other Ballistic case I have but, It's as good of quality or better than a lot of the basic slim cases out there.
customer_reviews.author: M.Smrz

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This case is very sturdy and comfortable in the hand. It doesn't stick to my hair like other covers. Its not to big and bulky either. If I drop my phone it is protected. Great cover
customer_reviews.author: Kari L. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: Has Definitely Passed the Test of Time with A+
customer_reviews.text: I have used this case for almost 3 years; and it has kept my iPhone 4s in very good shape. When the case was new, it was difficult to remove; but, now it comes off easily. It still looks practically new. I am now looking to upgrade my iPhone; and will be buying a Ballistic case for it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Campos

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Great price and protection for my Verizon I-phone 4s. The phone dropped 5 feet onto a hard floor without damage.
customer_reviews.author: Barry E.

customer_reviews.title: Slim fit
customer_reviews.text: Ths case fits securly around my iPhone. It's not bulky so when I have it in my pocket, it doesn't buldge. One time i dropped my phone and the phone was just fine since the ends of the case protect the sides (like the originial ballistic cases do). And I love the color! The case also fts securely around the buttons with no trouble :)
customer_reviews.author: sn2014

customer_reviews.title: ballistic phone case
customer_reviews.text: Great phone case for a teenager with a new I-phone. She really enjoyed the fact that she could change the colors of the corner on the case. She chooses which color she likes and changes them. This case is great for teens that have the dropsies.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my mother
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother. She fell in love with it. She doesn't like any other cases. It matches the one I have for my iPhone 5. The shipping was right on time. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: AshAlexander538

customer_reviews.title: Great case for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Great protection. Extremely slim. Top button a little difficult to push. Needs to be corrected. Love how it barely makes iPhone larger and keeps slim, light feel.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Y

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: Its' the wifes she likes color and style. Easy fit, protects it well enough good item for the money. thanks
customer_reviews.author: paul maykowski

customer_reviews.title: Good protection at a great price
customer_reviews.text: This has held up the inattentions of a Middle Schooler. She has dropped her phone on many occasions and the case is worse for the wear, but the phone isn't. The extra protection in the corners is great. She is one of the few kids in her class that doesn't have any cracks or scratches on her phone. After a year of abuse we bought another of the same case. It was still holding up, but for $14 why take chances? This case does it's job well and is a great price.
customer_reviews.author: books

customer_reviews.title: Good case!
customer_reviews.text: I don't regret that I ordered this case with changeable corners. Sixteen of them and they have four different colors. It came fast. As soon as case came I put it on my phone. I have it on my phone for more then few months. My phone fell many times but it still holding good. I love it!!! If you need good, strong case for your phone. Buy this one!!!
customer_reviews.author: Pavelemt

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great case. It almost drop-proofs your phone. The only issue I have with it is that the lock button on top of the phone is a little hard to push. I have this same case for an iPhone 5s and it doesn't have that issue.
customer_reviews.author: Pete M

customer_reviews.title: Fit the iPhone but strange texture.
customer_reviews.text: The color was pretty close to the photo on the web. It fits the iPhone great. Just a strange feel to it. My son likes it fine, but I wouldn't care for it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Armer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. I've dropped my phone twice and there's not ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. I've dropped my phone twice and there's not a scratch one on it. Slim, not bulky. Love this product
customer_reviews.author: TinaLouise10

customer_reviews.title: Good protection
customer_reviews.text: We have triplet toddlers who have previously chewed and broke several cases before. Surprisingly although this case is light it has done a good job of protecting the phone. The only downside is that it doesn't come with a screen cover
customer_reviews.author: Samir A. Alotaibi

customer_reviews.title: Weird rubber
customer_reviews.text: It's a weird kins of rubber kind of hard case. I don't like the feel of the Rubber. I will not recommend this case.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Ballistic LS0864-N985 LS Smooth Case for iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, made with good materials, good price quality ratio, I recominedo buy it if that's what you're looking for, it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great case
customer_reviews.text: Great case for my iPhone. Provides drop protection and slides in and out of my pockets smoothly. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn A. Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: Great case for IPhone 4
customer_reviews.text: Bought this case for my daughter and she loves it and I love it because it protects the phone very well.
customer_reviews.author: Vance Demoran

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Nice. Not too bulky and a good balance between a hard-case and a soft-case. I recommend this case to anyone looking for protection but not ridiculous size.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Cavanaugh Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Screen Shattered. :(
customer_reviews.text: My husband surprised me with a new phone and ordered this case for me from amazon! I really like the case. It looks great and I love how I can change the colors of the bumpers. HOWEVER...I'm a teacher and was picking the phone up from my desk. It slid out of my hand and landed face down on the CARPET and the screen shattered! The box said it's drop tested up to 6 ft. I wasn't even holding it 3 ft high. I'm SO sad! I had it less than 2 weeks when this happened...yesterday! Maybe it was just a weird thing, but hold onto your phone!!!
customer_reviews.author: ahahn

customer_reviews.title: Messed up my screen protector; power & volume buttons covered
customer_reviews.text: My two-part Griffin case finally broke after about 15 months of hard use (numerous drops), so I got this case, but am returning it. Its tight corners pushed up the edges of my Zagg screen cover on two sides causing big bubbles, plus the top power button and the side volume buttons are covered by the case and difficult to click, which seems like a strange design choice. Too bad because I do like the look and feel of the case. I am going to go back to a two-part case that doesn't smoosh my screen protector and that has cut-outs for my key buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Lorna Collier

product_meta.title: Ballistic LS0864-N985 LS Smooth Case for iPhone 4/4S - 1 Pack - Carrying Case - Retail Packaging - Purple TPU - 4 White, 4 Purple, 4 Black, 4 Teal Bumpers Included
